summary: A frustrated office worker learns that he is the son of a professional assassin and that he shares his father's superhuman killing abilities.
cast: James McAvoy|Morgan Freeman|Angelina Jolie|Terence Stamp|Thomas Kretschmann|Common|Kristen Hager|Marc Warren|David O'Hara|Konstantin Khabenskiy|Dato Bakhtadze|Chris Pratt|Lorna Scott|Sophiya Haque|Brian Caspe|Mark O'Neal|Bridget McManus|Bob Ari|Brad Calcaterra|Julia Copeland|Ryan Curtis|Claudia DiBiccari|Sharlene Grover|Michael Jeremiah|John Joseph MacDonald|Joseph Mazurk|Tyson Minnick|Larry Nazimek|Eliyas Qureshi|Amit Shah|Scarlett Sperduto|Giota Trakas|Mike Whyte|Bernadett Belinda York|George Zerante|Joshua Zumhagen
title: Wanted (Se busca)
